name: express-puppeteer-screenshot
description: Express application that uses Puppeteer to take screenshots

scripts.postinstall:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
      libx11-xcb1 \
      libxcomposite1 \
      libxrandr2 \
      libasound2 \
      libatk-bridge2.0-0 \
      libatk1.0-0 \
      libcups2 \
      libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 \
      libnspr4 \
      libnss3 \
      libxss1 \
      libxtst6 \
      fonts-liberation \
      libappindicator3-1 \
      libasound2-dev \
      libgtk-3-0
